::Feline::
She nodded and kept a close eye on the bot on the table. She leaned 
against the wall and looked at the femme bot laying there.  She 
shrugged and stood watch.


::Battera::
She saw Zardus walk by and grinned a little.  She hoped that Zardus 
would tell that feather head of a bot off, but she knew that that was 
wishful thinking.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus nods, agreeing to what Feline said. Hot Rod, Battera, and 
> Cybershark would probably need reprogramming, but how to do that 
> without them knowing... But it didn't matter. Their data tracks 
could 
> be cleared, but Hot Rod's could come in useful.
> 
> "We'll see what Skulletron's situation is later," he says, stopping 
> at a door to the CR chambers, he opens it, walking into the lab. He 
> walks over to a table and places Squizzy on it, strapping her in as 
> Battera's transmission reaches his comm-link.
> 
> "But reprogramming is a good idea. Can you watch this femm? I have 
> something to attend to. I'll be back shortly, then we can talk. If 
> she stirs, inject that liquid into her."
> 
> He points to a vial filled with green liquid. Turning, Zardus walks 
> out of the door, and to the exit of the base. He passes Battera and 
> opens the door, looking over the femm outside.
> 
> Looking down at the femm, the Alliance commander's red optics 
record 
> data about her, his scanners, along with the Alliance base's, 
> scanning her. Zardus steps out, the door closing behind him.
> 
> "I assume you're the bot that has Battera steaming?"
> 
> ---------
